entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow with periods of ice pellets early this morning and with periods of drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow at times mixed with drizzle early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
